00037 #ifdef MAGICK_FOUND

00040 
00041 bool RImage::loadMagick(std::string filename, double occupied, double equal)
00042 {
00043 #ifndef MAGICK_FOUND
00044     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("OpenRDK compiled without ImageMagick support, cannot load images using Magick++ library");
00045     return false;
00046 #else
00047     Image image;
00048     try {
00049         image.read(filename);
00050         image.modifyImage();
00051         image.type(TrueColorType);
00052         image.colorSpace(RGBColorspace);
00053         if (type == RImage::C8) {
00054             setSizeAndType(image.columns(), image.rows(), RImage::C8);
00055             for (size_t y = 0; y < image.rows(); y++) {
00056                 for (size_t x = 0; x < image.columns(); x++) {
00057                     ColorRGB c = image.pixelColor(x, y);
00058                     if (fabs(c.red() - c.blue()) < equal && fabs(c.green() - c.blue()) < equal){
00059                         if (1 - c.red() > occupied && 1 - c.blue() > occupied && 1 - c.green() > occupied ) {
00060                             buffer[y * width + x] = C8Black;
00061                         }
00062                         else {
00063                             buffer[y * width + x] = C8White;
00064                         }
00065                     }
00066                     else {
00067                         buffer[y * width + x] = C8Blue;
00068                     }
00069                 }
00070             }
00071         }
00072         else {
00073             setSizeAndType(image.columns(), image.rows(), RImage::RGB32);
00074             for (size_t y = 0; y < image.rows(); y++) {
00075                 for (size_t x = 0; x < image.columns(); x++) {
00076                     ColorRGB c = image.pixelColor(x,y);
00077                     buffer[(y * width + x) * 4] =     (unsigned char) (c.blue()  * 0xff);
00078                     buffer[(y * width + x) * 4 + 1] = (unsigned char) (c.green() * 0xff);
00079                     buffer[(y * width + x) * 4 + 2] = (unsigned char) (c.red()   * 0xff);
00080                 }
00081             }
00082         }
00083         return true;
00084     }
00085     catch (const exception& e) {
00086         return false;
00087     }
00088 #endif
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 bool RImage::saveMagick(std::string filename, bool trimImage)
00093 {
00094 #ifndef MAGICK_FOUND
00095     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("OpenRDK compiled without ImageMagick support, cannot load images using Magick++ library");
00096     return false;
00097 #else
00098     RImage* img = this->convertTo(RImage::RGB32);
00099     try {
00100         char* magickdimmerda = new char[img->width * img->height * getBytesPerPixel(RImage::RGB32)];
00101         memcpy(magickdimmerda, img->buffer, img->width * img->height * getBytesPerPixel(RImage::RGB32));
00102         if (type == RImage::RGB32 || type == RImage::RGB24) {
00103             Image image(img->width, img->height, "RGBA", CharPixel, magickdimmerda);
00104             image.backgroundColor(image.pixelColor(0, 0));
00105             image.matte(false);
00106             if (trimImage) image.trim();    // FIXME it doesn't work
00107             image.page(Magick::Geometry(0, 0));
00108             image.write(filename);
00109         }
00110         else {
00111             Image image(img->width, img->height, "BGRA", CharPixel, magickdimmerda);
00112             image.backgroundColor(image.pixelColor(0, 0));
00113             image.matte(false);
00114             if (trimImage) image.trim();    // FIXME it doesn't work
00115             image.page(Magick::Geometry(0, 0));
00116             image.write(filename);
00117         }
00118         delete img;
00119         return true;
00120     }
00121     catch (const exception& e) {
00122         delete img;
00123         return false;
00124     }
00125 #endif
00126 }
